traits.name: Created Race
traits.desc: The boarfolk has advantage on saving throws against spells and effects which would alter its form.

traits.name: Keen Scent
traits.desc: A boarfolk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks based on scent.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
